vehicles.description: A yellow construction vehicle, possibly a backhoe loader, is positioned obliquely across the road, blocking the lane the ego car is in and occupying a portion of the oncoming traffic lane.
vehicles.explanation: It impacts the driving behavior as it obstructs the pathway and requires the ego car to either stop or navigate around the obstacle safely.

suggestions: The ego car should reduce speed, maintain a safe distance, and prepare to either stop or carefully pass the construction vehicle if an opening in the oncoming lane is clearly available and it’s safe to do so, after ensuring no oncoming traffic is present. Furthermore, the wet road condition requires additional caution for decreased traction.
